title: 136A.097 ORDER OF AID CALCULATIONS.
text:
The commissioner must calculate aid for programs in the order of their original enactment from oldest to most recent. The commissioner may determine the order of calculating state financial aid if:
(1) a student is eligible for multiple state financial aid programs; and
(2) two or more of those programs calculate funding after accounting for other state aid.
If the commissioner determines that a greater amount of financial aid would be available to students by calculating aid in a particular order, the commissioner may calculate aid in that order.
